    Configuration provider classes.
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.ognl  
    org.apache.struts2.components

    This package contains a reimagining of the traditional Struts filter dispatchers.
    org.apache.struts2.interceptor.parameter  
    org.apache.struts2.ognl  
  • Classes in org.apache.struts2.ognl used by com.opensymphony.xwork2.config.providers 
    Class and Description
    ProviderAllowlist
    Allows registration of classes that should be allowed to be used in OGNL expressions, using a key to identify the source of the allowlist.
  • Classes in org.apache.struts2.ognl used by com.opensymphony.xwork2.ognl 
    Class and Description
    OgnlGuard
    Guards all expressions parsed by Struts Core.
    ProviderAllowlist
    Allows registration of classes that should be allowed to be used in OGNL expressions, using a key to identify the source of the allowlist.
    ThreadAllowlist
    Allows any bean to allowlist a class for use in OGNL expressions, for the current thread only.
  • Classes in org.apache.struts2.ognl used by org.apache.struts2.components 
    Class and Description
    ThreadAllowlist
    Allows any bean to allowlist a class for use in OGNL expressions, for the current thread only.
  • Classes in org.apache.struts2.ognl used by org.apache.struts2.dispatcher 
    Class and Description
    ThreadAllowlist
    Allows any bean to allowlist a class for use in OGNL expressions, for the current thread only.
